extendedInfo.description: Fore! Test your mini golf skills to see just how many hole-in-ones, pars, or birdies you can get in 3D Mini Golf Challenge.Play the best casual sports game in amazing 3D graphics. Play 4 different challenge types with 100 unique tracks in the original 3D Mini Golf Challenge.Now you can also play on Sonyericsson Xperia Play.3D MINI GOLF CHALLENGE: -Enjoy 20 addictive challenges across 100 holes that contain 4 different challenge types: -Par Challenge â The traditional challenge -Time Attack â Play against the clock -Hole-in-One â Try your luck at sinking every hole in one shot -Versus â Test your skills by playing against a computer AI character -Play in 4 unique themes -Excalibur -Transylvania -Pirateâs Cove -Super Nova -Choose between two different characters: male or female -Realistic Mini Golf physics -Relaxing and real music to help you visualize the sinking that ball in one shotAll trademarks referenced herein are the property of their respective ownersKeywordsgolf3dchallengeminigolfsportsparExcalibur Transylvania PirateCove

reviews.title: Good game!
reviews.comment: I had this on my iPod back in 2010 and I loved it.  It\'s great to have it on my Xperia Play now  :D  the game runs well for me,  however the Xperia Play controls are a little dodgy.  Great to see that this was recently updated and I am looking forward to seeing more  :)
reviews.author: Osmo sys

reviews.title: Uber
reviews.comment: This game needs online and different control options but other than that great game n great courses definitely great courses they\'re the coolest courses ive seen on a cell phone game. But if you cant play online there\'s no need to keep the game after you finish one player so update and give us online. Online!!!
reviews.author: anthony stephens

reviews.title: What\'s happened!
reviews.comment: This was an excellent game, however, recently some of the courses do not display correctly,I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling, still get random blank courses :-(
reviews.author: Geoff Howes

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Like it alot!
reviews.author: Pedro Hernandez

reviews.comment: Love this game
reviews.author: Brandy Tewaru

reviews.title: I\'m playing like Stevie Wonder on some levels!
reviews.comment: Fix the f\302\244cking glitch!!!
reviews.author: Steven Hall

reviews.title: Force close on s3
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing every 10min and a couple tracks don\'t even have the tracks, can only see the clocks on time attack. This game was great on my ipod and I was so happy to see it on android but its just depressing me now
reviews.author: Nicole Taylor

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Looks like Samsung users having tough time but fine on Sony Xperia arc s. Lots of gameplay
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Fun game. Addictive and challenging but could do with more levels
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lack of support
reviews.comment: Looks like a lack of support for Samsung devices and to fix bugs. Loved it on my Atrix 4G, but can\'t enjoy it on my Note II. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Robert Knight

reviews.title: Jess
reviews.comment: Good game but frustrating that is has errors n shuts down
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but crashes often
reviews.comment: Crashes fairly often for no apparent reason. Also there seems to be no way to exit the game, so have to kill it with task killer. Very addictive apart from these niggles though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DO NOT BOTHER
reviews.comment: Crashes my.galaxy note every time, want a refund!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Such a shame
reviews.comment: I loved this on the iphone... Spent hours on the thing! Its such a shame that the android version has a mind of its own & crashes when it feels like it! Ive sent a report about it, for a paid game i expect it to works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Great addictive game but it crashes a lot so I think I\'ll un install :/
reviews.author: Leanne Hurd

reviews.title: Force Closes on Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Makes it about 2 or 3 holes then FC\'s when trying to go to the next hole. 2 Stars because the 3 holes I have played were fun.
reviews.author: Mark Jensen

reviews.title: Too buggy
reviews.comment: Great, fun game but constant crashing on my S3 really frustrates me. Paid for game shouldn\'t be this buggy. Shame.
reviews.author: Ben Wood

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Very buggy in game play and crashes often
reviews.author: Caitlin Morgan

reviews.title: Crashes constantly
reviews.comment: Crashes on my Note 2. It also left behind an unknown undeletable app when I deleted it.
reviews.author: Chris Melendez

reviews.title: Good game. But....
reviews.comment: It crashes and freezes ...
reviews.author: A Google User
